TestNSXReturnThrowError.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00002 #import <NSXReturnThrowError.h>
00003 #include <mach/error.h>
00004 
00005 #ifndef ERRSTR_T
00006     #define ERRSTR_T
00007     typedef const char* errstr_t;
00008 #endif
00009 
00010 //--
00011 
00012 static OSErr returnNoOSErr() { return 0; }
00013 static OSStatus returnNoOSStatus() { return 0; }
00014 static int returnNoPosixErr() { return 0; }
00015 static mach_error_t returnNoMach_error() { return err_none; }
00016 static id returnObjCInstance() { return [NSFileManager defaultManager]; }
00017 static errstr_t returnNoErrstr() { return NULL; }
00018 
00019 static OSErr returnOSErr() { return qErr; }
00020 static OSStatus returnOSStatus() { return qErr; }
00021 static int returnPosixErr() { errno = EPERM; return -1; }
00022 static mach_error_t returnMach_error() { return err_local|1; }
00023 static id returnNilObjCInstance() { return nil; }
00024 static errstr_t returnErrstr() { return "some_error"; }
00025 
00026 //--
00027 
00028 int main (int argc, const char * argv[]) {
00029     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00030     NSError *error = nil;
00031     
00032     //--
00033     
00034     #define errorCodeTypeFromRValue(RVALUE) errorCodeTypeFromObjCType(@encode(typeof(RVALUE)))
00035     assert(JRErrorCodeType_Carbon == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoOSErr()));
00036     assert(JRErrorCodeType_Carbon == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoOSStatus()));
00037     assert(JRErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoPosixErr()));
00038     assert(JRErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoMach_error()));
00039     assert(JRErrorCodeType_Cocoa == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnObjCInstance()));
00040     assert(JRErrorCodeType_errstr == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoErrstr()));
00041     
00042     //--
00043     
00044     NSXReturnError(returnNoOSErr());
00045         assert(!error);
00046     NSXReturnError(returnNoOSStatus());
00047         assert(!error);
00048     NSXReturnError(returnNoPosixErr());
00049         assert(!error);
00050     NSXReturnError(returnNoMach_error());
00051         assert(!error);
00052     NSXReturnError(returnObjCInstance());
00053         assert(!error);
00054     NSXReturnError(returnNoErrstr());
00055         assert(!error);
00056     
00057     //--
00058     
00059     NSXReturnError(returnOSErr());
00060         assert(error);
00061         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00062         assert([error code] == qErr);
00063         error = nil;
00064     NSXReturnError(returnOSStatus());
00065         assert(error);
00066         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00067         assert([error code] == qErr);
00068         error = nil;
00069     NSXReturnError(returnPosixErr());
00070         assert(error);
00071         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSPOSIXErrorDomain]);
00072         assert([error code] == EPERM);
00073         error = nil;
00074     NSXReturnError(returnMach_error());
00075         assert(error);
00076         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSMachErrorDomain]);
00077         assert([error code] == (err_local|1));
00078         error = nil;
00079     NSXReturnError(returnNilObjCInstance());
00080         assert(error);
00081         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSCocoaErrorDomain]);
00082         assert([error code] == -1);
00083         error = nil;
00084     NSXReturnError(returnErrstr());
00085         assert(error);
00086         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:@"errstr"]);
00087         assert([error code] == -1);
00088         assert([[[error userInfo] objectForKey:@"errstr"] isEqualToString:@"some_error"]);
00089         error = nil;
00090     
00091     //--
00092     
00093     NS_DURING
00094         NSXThrowError(returnOSErr());
00095         assert(0);
00096     NS_HANDLER
00097         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSError"]);
00098         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00099     NS_ENDHANDLER
00100         assert(error);
00101         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00102         assert([error code] == qErr);
00103         error = nil;
00104     
00105     NS_DURING
00106         NSXThrowError(returnOSStatus());
00107         assert(0);
00108     NS_HANDLER
00109         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSError"]);
00110         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00111     NS_ENDHANDLER
00112         assert(error);
00113         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00114         assert([error code] == qErr);
00115         error = nil;
00116     
00117     NS_DURING
00118         NSXThrowError(returnPosixErr());
00119         assert(0);
00120     NS_HANDLER
00121         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSError"]);
00122         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00123     NS_ENDHANDLER
00124         assert(error);
00125         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSPOSIXErrorDomain]);
00126         assert([error code] == EPERM);
00127         error = nil;
00128     
00129     NS_DURING
00130         NSXThrowError(returnMach_error());
00131         assert(0);
00132     NS_HANDLER
00133         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSError"]);
00134         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00135     NS_ENDHANDLER
00136         assert(error);
00137         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSMachErrorDomain]);
00138         assert([error code] == (err_local|1));
00139         error = nil;
00140     
00141     NS_DURING
00142         NSXThrowError(returnNilObjCInstance());
00143         assert(0);
00144     NS_HANDLER
00145         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSError"]);
00146         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00147     NS_ENDHANDLER
00148         assert(error);
00149         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSCocoaErrorDomain]);
00150         assert([error code] == -1);
00151         error = nil;
00152     
00153     NS_DURING
00154         NSXThrowError(returnErrstr());
00155         assert(0);
00156     NS_HANDLER
00157         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSError"]);
00158         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00159     NS_ENDHANDLER
00160         assert(error);
00161         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:@"errstr"]);
00162         assert([error code] == -1);
00163         assert([[[error userInfo] objectForKey:@"errstr"] isEqualToString:@"some_error"]);
00164         error = nil;
00165     
00166     //--
00167         
00168     NSXReturnError(open("/does/not/exist", O_RDONLY, 0));
00169         assert(error);
00170         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSPOSIXErrorDomain]);
00171         assert([error code] == ENOENT);
00172         error = nil;
00173     
00174     [pool release];
00175     printf("success\n");
00176     return 0;
00177 }
